subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Simple FM Sweep Radio Design/how_you_doin'--bruce_and_steve.mp3 
  Uploaded by : urkel232002 <urkel23@...> 
  Description : "How ya Doin' Bruce and Steve"---Haven't done a session with Joe's box in a while.  This file i got in the first 8 seconds of the recording.  Pretty funny that they know Bruce and I before we even say anything.  I was alone during this recording, but bruce and i do a lot of sessions on Skype.  So, they probablt thought we were both there during the recording today. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Simple%20FM%20Sweep%20Radio%20Design/how_you_doin%27--bruce_and_steve.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

urkel232002 <urkel23@...>
